ygData.subject: The Quest for the Langseax [REPLY]
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings John! I ve done this quest approximatly 7 times now, and got the 2H Langseax once! Talk about making my day! Langseax, 1H Slash, 6 DMG, 23 DLY,
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings John!

I've done this quest approximatly 7 times now, and got the 2H Langseax
once! Talk about making my day!

Langseax, 1H Slash, 6 DMG, 23 DLY, Magical, Warrior Only

Langseax of the Wolves, 2H Slash, 19 DMG, 44 DLY, +5 STR, +5 DEX, Magical,
Warrior only, *LORE*

Here is the key. You must have a 'high' aimiably. I got myself 'high' by
turning in tons of gnoll fangs to the barbarian warror woman in Halas. (I
just re-read that statement and left it the way it was ;))

Myself and my roomate barabarian shamen make an evening out of this. We
each do each step of the way (even following and killing the murderer).
and that way we each get a sword ( and GREAT exp) at level 22 =) (I am at
3 bubbles of exp almost all from doing this quest multiple times)

The rare drop guy (you will know becuase his name is NOT Basil, I forget
his name) was yellow to me at 22nd chord, and the regular guy is blue.

(the heads look the same, you get the sword when you complete it. MY
suggestion is, if you get the 2H version LET someone else do it you KNOW
can complete it, I would HATE to see you lose it, also realize the 2H
version IS LORE, so sell give to someone before you get the 2H version
again!!)

Hope that helps =D

Frashii, 22nd Missed note bard
Follower of Rodcet Nife on Tareww Marr
Seekers of Lore, http://www.loreseekers.com


PS. HINT When you get the lions delight, and are running around everfrost
looking for Iceberg and Tundra Jack,
BE DARN CAREFUL YOU DONT HAVE THE LIONS DELIGHT ABOVE YOUR REGULAR FOOD.
I kept 'losing' that darn lions delight, and couldn't figure it out!!
(Hint: Lions delight is EDIBLE). I felt like such a gumby! I was was NOT
'delighted' when I figured it out =D



-----
> Date: Wed, 08 Sep 1999 11:06:12 -0400
> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>Subject: The Quest for the Langseax>
>
>
>Has anyone here done the Langseax quest? Last night, I did this quest,
>to obtain one of the lovely Langseax swords for my warrior pal. For
>those of you who don't know the quest, it's an upper 20s type of quest,
>and though not particularly hard, it's certainly time consuming.
>
>I did all the parts to the quest, obtained the final item (the murderer's
>head), carefully sang my carrillon at the guy (who then regarded me
>amiably), and gave him the head. To which he said, "Although the wolves
>of the north bear you no ill will... blah blah blah NO SWORD FOR YOU!"
>(Okay, that wasn't the exact dialog, but you get the idea).>

>Is it a warrior only quest or something? It didn't seem to be. Anyone
>else had any experience with it?

Jyzan
